July 4th Celebration

Events

We’re having a party
on the 4th of July
There will be dinner & fireworks
to light up the sky
We hope that you’ll come
and plan to stay
to celebrate Uncle Sam’s Birthday!

Friday, July 4th
6:00 PM
Sea Girt Lighthouse Front Lawn

New Volunteer Orientation

News, Volunteer

Thursday May 20th, 2017 we will be having a New Volunteer Orientation. If you’re looking to get involved with the community and enjoy the historical atmosphere of Sea Girt, come and be a part of the family!
